task.title: Create users
task.shortdesc: Add an account for a new user

taskbody.context: Each person who will be using Google services (like Google Workspace or Cloud Identity) with your organization needs an account. If you haven't already added users to your Admin console, you can do that now.

step.cmd: Sign into your Google Admin Console
In the Admin console, go to Menu > Directory > Users
At the top of the page, click Add new user
Repeat these steps for more users
